testcase.name: testDeleteEmployee

failure.message: PreparedStatementCallback; SQL [INSERT INTO employees (login, password, first_name, last_name, salary, department_id) VALUES ( ?,?,?,?,?,? )]; Cannot add or update a child row: a foreign key constraint fails (`test`.`employees`, CONSTRAINT `DPTO_ID_FK` FOREIGN KEY (`DEPARTMENT_ID`) REFERENCES `departments` (`department_id`)); nested exception is com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.MySQLIntegrityConstraintViolationException: Cannot add or update a child row: a foreign key constraint fails (`test`.`employees`, CONSTRAINT `DPTO_ID_FK` FOREIGN KEY (`DEPARTMENT_ID`) REFERENCES `departments` (`department_id`))
